targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  concat(Date_format(min(TIMESTAMP),'%d.%m'),' bis ',Date_format(max(TIMESTAMP),'%d.%m.%Y')) as value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY time_sec DESC

SELECT  
Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y %k:%i') as Zeit,
operatingStatus as StatusCode,
( Case operatingStatus
  When 0 then 'off'
  When 1 then 'anfahren'
  When 2 then 'Leerlauf'  
  When 3 then 'Einspeisen (MPP)'
  When 4 then 'abgeregelt'
  When 5 then 'Einspeisen'
  Else 'undefined'
  End) as Status
FROM (
    SELECT
        operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP,
        @rn := CASE WHEN (@prev <> operatingStatus) THEN @rn+1 ELSE @rn END AS rn,
    	@prev := operatingStatus
    FROM (
        SELECT operatingStatus,time_sec,TIMESTAMP
        FROM WR_Daten
        WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
        ORDER BY ID ) AS a , 
        (SELECT @prev := -1, @rn := 0) AS vars 
) T1 Group BY rn ORDER BY `T1`.`time_sec` DESC

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(min(TIMESTAMP))*3600 as time_sec,
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  1-LEAST(sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh),1) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
    DATE(TIMESTAMP) Between DATE_SUB(DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d")), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d"))
GROUP BY HOUR(TIMESTAMP)

SELECT
  time_sec+3600 as time_sec,
  "WR" AS metric,
  max(acPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  max(dcPowerPV) AS "PV Power"
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec+2*3600 as time_sec,
  "Bat Power"  AS metric,
  max(BatPowerEntLaden) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
    time_sec+3*3600 as time_sec,
  "Bat Laden"  AS metric,
  max(BatPowerLaden) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
    time_sec+4*3600 as time_sec,
  "Einspeisen"  AS metric,
  max(EinspeisenPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  $__unixEpochFrom()+hour(TIMESTAMP)*3600+minute(TIMESTAMP)*60 as time_sec,
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y') AS metric,
  avg(dcPowerPV) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  DATE(TIMESTAMP) Between DATE_SUB(DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d")), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND DATE(Date_format($__timeFrom(),"%Y-%m-%d"))
GROUP BY time_sec DIV 1200

SELECT
  "AVG (per day)" as "type",
  concat(Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.'),' bis ',Date_format(max(TIMESTAMP),'%d.%m.%Y')) as Datum,
  avg(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  avg(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  avg(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  avg(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  avg(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  avg(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  avg(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  avg(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  avg(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  avg(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (timerange)" as "type",
  concat(Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.'),' bis ',Date_format(max(TIMESTAMP),'%d.%m.%Y')) as Datum,
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
union all
SELECT
  "Sum (overall)" as "type",
  Date_format(TIMESTAMP,'%d.%m.%Y') as Datum,
  sum(PV_kWh) AS "PV",
  sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS "Bat Laden",
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh) AS "Bat Laden (frei)",
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh) AS "Bat",
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR",
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS "Einspeisen",
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch PV",
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Bat",
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS "Hausverbrauch Netz"
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily

SELECT
  time_sec AS time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(Einspeisen_kWh) AS Einspeisen,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauchsanteil,
  sum(ac_kWh) AS "WR output",
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Eigenverbrauch
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh) AS PV,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh) AS Batterie,
  sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh) AS Netz,
  sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS Gesamt,
  1-LEAST(sum(HomeConsumptionGrid_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh),1) AS Autarkie
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "WR" AS metric,
  sum(ac_kWh)/sum(PV_kWh-BatLaden_kWh+BatEntladen_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat" AS metric,
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (incl WR)" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  avg(BatTemperature) as value,
  "Bat.Temperatur" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (Eigenverbrauch)" AS metric,
  sum(AktHomeConsumptionBat)/sum(acPower) AS value
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE
  AktHomeConsumptionBat>1 and dcPowerPV<1 and $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Anteil int. Laden" AS metric,
  sum(BatLaden_frei_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Bat (DC/DC/AC)" AS metric,
  sum(BatEntladen_kWh)/sum(BatLaden_kWh)*sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,ac_kWh,0))/sum(if(PV_kWh=0 AND BatEntLaden_kWh is not null,BatEntLaden_kWh,0)) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec as time_sec,
  "mit Bat" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec as time_sec,
  "ohne Bat" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(HomeConsumption_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "mit Bat" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh+HomeConsumptionBat_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "ohne Bat" AS metric,
  sum(HomeConsumptionSolar_kWh)/sum(ac_kWh) AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_daily
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
GROUP BY $grouping

SELECT
  time_sec,
  dcPowerPV as value,
  "PV Power" as metric
FROM WR_Daten
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
ORDER BY ID ASC

SELECT
  time_sec,
  "Autarkie" AS metric,
  Autarkie AS value
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE
  $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  -(BatEntladen_kWh) as value,
  "Bat Entladen" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)

SELECT
  time_sec,
  BatLaden_kWh as value,
  "Bat Laden" as metric
FROM aggregate_WR_Daten_hourly
WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec)
